mapper.update: UPDATE Reply SET reply = #{reply}, updated = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Reply (boardId, memberId, reply) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{memberId}, #{reply})
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.boardId, r.memberId, r.reply, r.inserted, r.updated, m.nickName FROM Reply r JOIN Member m ON r.memberId = m.id WHERE r.boardId = #{boardId} ORDER BY r.id DESC
